results.text: You are on a roll, uncovering secrets and deducing leads. You have advantage on your next Investigation check.
You’ve spent a lot of time in libraries and archives, and you know just where to go to find what you’re looking for. You gain one piece of Key Knowledge related to the topic you are researching.

You have an eye for provenance and quality. You automatically appraise the actual value (in gold) of an item you have found or an item that is being sold to you, and you know if a merchant is attempting to rip you off.
Your powers of pattern recognition are unmatched. For the next hour, you have advantage on checks made to decipher any ciphers or coded messages you find.
Your intuition is telling you something is off here. You are considered to be under the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.u4r9fu1nxbtieekm]{Find Traps} spell for the next minute.
You know just where to be to pick up on choice gossip. You overhear or otherwise uncover one important rumor related to an authority figure, organization, or some other figurehead.
